title: GenericDetector
description: The GenericDetector element is used to represent a detector as a collection of key/value pairs, stored in a Map. The other detector objects should always be used in preference to this if possible.

Name.description: A user defined name for this component.

ID.description: A unique identifier for this component.

Gain.description: The analog gain is the conversion unit for this detector. It specifies how many electrons correspond to 1 signal unit. It is expressed in e-/Analog-to-Digit-Unit (ADU).

Mount.description: The type of mount used for the camera.

ReadNoise.description: Read noise includes thermal noise build-up and clock induced charge. This is generally expressed in e- rms

DetectorNoiseModel.description: The noise contribution that comes from the detector

DarkCurrentRate.description: Median current detected in the absence of light. Generally expressed in e-/pixel/sec

PeakWavelength.description: The wavelength associated with maximum light intensity detected by this device

QuantumEfficiencyatPeakWavelength.description: The Quantum Efficiency observed at peak wavelength. Quantum Efficiency is generally defined as is the ratio of incident photon to converted electrons. Typically expressed as a number between 0 and 1.

AmbientOperatingTemperature.description: The ambient temperature at which this detector is designed to operate

AmbientOperatingHumidity.description: The ambient humidity at which this detector is designed to operate

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of this component

LotNumber.description: The lot number of this component

SpecsFile.description: Provide the location of a PDF file with the specifications for the component as provided by the manufacturer.

WavelengthRange.description: This records a range of wavelengths associated with the associated microscope component. Multiple of this elements may be used.

CutIn.description: CutIn is the wavelength below which the response rate is below 50%.

CutOut.description: CutOut is the wavelength above which the response rate is below 50%.

WavelenghtProfile.description: The location of a file containing the wavelenght profile of this component.

RelayLens.description: This is a reference to a lens positioned at the mount connecting this detector to the microscope body.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: The AnnotationRef element is a reference to an element derived from the CommentAnnotation element, which consists of a simple comment multi-line annotation.

Map.description: This is a Mapping of key/value pairs used to store customized metadata that describes this element.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
